title: Riot.... Help me.....
body:
Dear Riot, 
I only have 410 rp but to purchase Frosted Ezreal I need 110rp more.... Is there a way that I can small amount of rp for free? 

Thank you, De Han Min Kook( which means Korea btw)

replies.body: Hey there!  We can definitely help when we can if it's for a small amount of RP.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can find something for you.
